events.title: Global Citizen Festival
events.location: New York, New York, United States Of America
events.description: After reserving tickets, for availability on exchanging your tickets for ADA through Global Citizens follow & complete this link: https://airtable.com/app23s2bwBTi75jQK/shrUt650ILgdI8YDT All tickets are General Admission and standing only. Must adhere to Ground Rules on Ticket/Global Citizen Website. MUST PRINT YOUR TICKETS! Tickets displayed on mobile phone not accepted. No Re-entry. Event is Rain/Shine. No Entry after 9pm allowed. Re-sale of Free/Donated/Promotional tickets is stricly prohibited by Global and by NYS. Tickets are subject to void if found to be posted for unlawful sale. Must have a Ticketmaster PDF printed Ticket in hand. Tickets won via Draw. winning code not enough to enter, need Ticketmaster Ticket. Gates open at 2pm. Music starts at 4pm. Gates close at 9pm/No entry allowed after 9pm. Show ends roughly around 10pm. Get there early! Tickets available to PRINT Sat, Sep 14th at 4pm
